name: Tainted Blade: The Dungeon Escape
description:
There once was a young wizard who discovered an ancient magic. It was a dark magic. He learned the spells that were supposed to be forgotten. Blinded by the darkness he did the unthinkable - he sacrificed human lives to fuel his arcane powers. The kingdom captured this wizard and locked him in the deepest dungeon.

But the wizard couldn’t be contained for any longer. You cannot be contained. ESCAPE THE DUNGEON!
